title: Szatyorbolt
description: Szatyor is a community based business whose aim is the growth of conscious consumption and sustainability in Budapest. It operates this store to offer fresh organic veggies and fruit and other local products, bulk food, foods like organic flour, pasta, olive oil, and fair-trade coffee. There is a section for eco-cleaning items and  kitchen equipment like cereal milk machine makers. It's also possible to sit there and read from its library of books about ecology and food issues and magazines about permaculture. On Tuesday and Thursday Szatyorbolt works as a CSA where you could order in advance a basket with fresh farm products.
